<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>If no sys_logger_configuration record exists yet for AWA, create one.  If the legacy "com.snc.awa.syslog.enabled" property if true, enable the configuration by default.</description>
        <name>Migrate AWA logging configuration</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var sysLoggerConfigGR =  new GlideRecord('sys_logger_configuration');
sysLoggerConfigGR.addQuery('logger_name', 'com.snc.awa');
sysLoggerConfigGR.query();
if (!sysLoggerConfigGR.next()) {
	var syslogPropValue = gs.getProperty("com.snc.awa.syslog.enabled", "false");
	sysLoggerConfigGR.initialize();
	sysLoggerConfigGR.setValue('logger_name', 'com.snc.awa');
	sysLoggerConfigGR.setValue('active', syslogPropValue);
	sysLoggerConfigGR.setValue('additive', 'false');
	sysLoggerConfigGR.setValue('level', 'INFO');
	sysLoggerConfigGR.setValue('destination', 'DATABASE');
	sysLoggerConfigGR.insert();
}
]]></script>
